title.ja: PMU — パーマネントメイク

subtitle.vi: Nâng Tầm Vẻ Đẹp, Đơn Giản Hóa Thói Quen Của Bạn
subtitle.ja: 美しさを高め、日常を簡素化
subtitle.es: Elevando la Belleza, Simplificando tu Rutina

introduction.en: Permanent Makeup (PMU) is the art of enhancing natural beauty with advanced micropigmentation techniques. At Vy Brows Academy & Studio, we specialize in delivering professional PMU services designed to give you flawless, lasting results while saving you time every day.

en: Expert Artists trained in advanced international PMU techniques
High-Quality Pigments that are safe, hypoallergenic, and long-lasting
Customized Designs to fit your face shape, skin tone, and personal style
Safe & Hygienic Practices with medical-grade tools and sterilization standards
Long-Lasting Results that gradually fade naturally without harsh edges

closing.en: Permanent Makeup is not just about beauty – it's about confidence, convenience, and self-expression. Wake up every day with perfectly shaped brows, defined eyes, and naturally tinted lips.

description.en: Professional permanent makeup services for eyebrows, eyeliner, and lips.
description.vi: Dịch vụ Phun Xăm thẩm mỹ chuyên nghiệp cho lông mày, eyeliner và môi.
description.ja: 眉毛、アイライナー、リップのパーマネントメイクサービス。
description.es: Servicios profesionales de maquillaje permanente para cejas, delineador y labios.
